SEARCH

Package org.scictrl.csshell.epics.server.application

package org.scictrl.csshell.epics.server.application
  • Class
    Description
    ArrayDumpApplication
    ArrayDumpApplication monitors input PV array record, and dumps array values into file, if any value in array exceeds threshold value, configurable by PV.
    BeamDumpApplication
    BeamDumpApplication stores image (of a beam) into files on drive on event from tirgger PV called drops.
    BeamScanApplication
    BeamScanApplication scans the beam with four control values: power, phase, solenoid magnet and bending magnet.
    BeamSpotApplication
    BeamSpotApplication connects server with direct beam parameters, then filters and averages them and provides summary data.
    BeamSpotApplication.BeamSpotData
    Enumeration defining name and position of parameters in data array with combined measurements returned trough BeamSpotApplication.DATA PV.
    BPMCalculatorApplication
    Filters and averages the BPM values.
    EmittanceScanApplication
    Filters and averages the BPM values.
    EnergyScanApplication
    Filters and averages the BPM values.
    FluteCalculator
    FluteCalculator class.
    FluteCyclingApplication
    FluteCyclingApplication class.
    ICTApplication
    ICTApplication converts charge readout from ADC (BCM - Beam Charge Monitor pickup) to beam charge value.
    LaserApplication
    LaserApplication class.
    LLRFWaveformSumApplication
    Waveform summary calculator with conversion from amplitude to power.
    MultiScanApplication
    Filters and averages the BPM values.
    PhaseScanApplication
    Scans phase, analyzes ICT reading and extracts breaking points.
    PowerControlApplication
    PowerControlApplication class.
    PowerInterlockApplication
    Listens to preflected power limiter interlock signal, which is triggered when RF cavity sparking occurs.
    PowerInterlockApplication.RateCalculator
    Calculates rate of interlocks on normalized time interval.
    PowerSplitterApplication
    PowerSplitterApplication class.
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication class.
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication2
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication2 class.
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication3
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication3 class.
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication3.FeedbackControl
    Feedback algorithm must implement this interface in order to be controlled by this application.
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication3.SM
    State of last operation.
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication31
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication31 class.
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication32
    StepFeedbackLoopApplication32 class.
    ToggleScanApplication
    Filters and averages the BPM values.
